column2: Nordstrom, Inc. engages in the manufacture and trade of clothes, shoes, and accessories. The company is headquartered in Seattle, Washington and currently employs 76,000 full-time employees. The firm offers private labeled apparel, shoes, cosmetics and accessories for women, men, young adults and children. The firm serves customers through retail segment, which includes Full-Price and Off-Price businesses. The Company’s operations consist of its Nordstrom U.S. and Canada full-line stores, the United States and Canada Nordstrom Rack stores, Jeffrey boutiques, Last Chance clearance stores, Trunk Club clubhouses and Nordstrom Local. Additionally, the Company’s customers are also served online through Nordstrom.com, Nordstromrack.com, HauteLook and TrunkClub.com.
